Detailed Description

An expandable hash table in a file.

Define Documentation

#define HFILE_BUFFER_SIZE   0x4000

Size of buffer used in hfile_expand.

Function Documentation

hfile_t hfile_create ( unsigned int  element_size,
unsigned int  base_size,
unsigned int  size,
hfile_hash  hash_f,
hfile_eq  eq_f,
hfile_decode  decode_f,
hfile_encode  encode_f,
const char *  file_name,
pthread_mutex_t *  mutex 
)

Create the hash table data structure with SIZE elements, hash function HASH_F, compare function EQ_F, decode function DECODE_F, encode function ENCODE_F and file FILE_NAME. The size of the whole element is ELEMENT_SIZE, te size of base of element is BASE_SIZE

bool hfile_delete ( hfile_t  hfile,
void *  x 
)

Delete element X from hash file HFILE. Return false on file failure.

void hfile_destroy ( hfile_t  hfile  ) 

Destroy the hash table HTAB.

static bool hfile_expand ( hfile_t  hfile  )  [static]

Expand or shrink hash file HFILE when necessary. Return true on success.

static uint64_t hfile_find_empty_slot ( hfile_t  hfile,
hashval_t  hash 
) [static]

Find an empty slot for hfile_expand. HASH is the hash value for the element to be inserted. Expects no deleted slots in the table.

static uint64_t hfile_find_slot ( hfile_t  hfile,
const void *  elem,
hashval_t  hash,
bool  insert 
) [static]

Find a slot for ELEM. HASH is the hash value for the element to be inserted. Expects no deleted slots in the table.

bool hfile_init ( hfile_t  hfile,
struct stat *  st 
)

Initialize hash file HFILE.

bool hfile_insert ( hfile_t  hfile,
void *  x,
bool  base_only 
)

Insert element X into hash file HFILE. If BASE_ONLY is true insert only the base of the element. Return false on file failure.

bool hfile_lookup ( hfile_t  hfile,
void *  x 
)

Lookup element X from hash file HFILE. Return false on file failure.

static uint32_t hfile_read_element ( hfile_t  hfile,
uint64_t  offset 
) [static]

Read an element and return status of slot from HFILE on offset OFFSET.

Read and return status of slot from HFILE on offset OFFSET.
